articles.content: It said that it would set the manufacturing standards for FSMP catered to patients suffering from 1) hypertension 2) pneumonia 3) liver disease 4) inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) and 5) dehydration … [+1328 chars]

articles.title: India-made drug shown to treat heart damage caused by Covid protein : Study - Kashmir Reader
